title.rendered: Financial Commission Announces TorrentFX as Latest Approved Member

content.rendered:
March 1st, 2018, leading external dispute resolution (EDR) organization, Financial Commission, catering to the financial services industry and operated by FinaCom PLC, today announces TorrentFX as its newest approved Member.

TorrentFX status as an A-category Member of the Financial Commission took effect on March 1, 2018, following the approval of its membership application by Financial Commission, thus allowing the company and its customers access to a wide range of services and membership benefits including, but not limited to, protection for up to €20,000 per submitted complaint, backed by the Financial Commission’s compensation fund.

Financial Commission provides brokerages and their customers with an unbiased 3rd party mediation platform that helps resolve complaints in instances when parties are unable to directly come to an agreement over disputes.

For approved members and their clients participating in CFDs, foreign exchange (forex) and cryptocurrency markets, Financial Commission helps facilitate a simpler, swifter resolution process than through typical regulatory channels such as arbitration or local court systems.

TorrentFX joins a diverse range of brokerages and independent services providers (ISPs) that utilise the services of the Financial Commission and as part of their commitment to their clients while upholding membership requirements.

About TorrentFX

TorrentFX is a global online forex trading platform driven and powered by technology and data, specializing in providing an extensive variety of trading products including Forex, CFDs, Shares, Metals, Digital Currencies for retail and institutional clients worldwide.

Founded by experts from well-branded forex companies, TorrentFX is backed up by rich institutional experience in forex trading. The company values and spares no efforts to maintain a good company reputation. With ten offices around the globe, the company still maintains a reputation of zero customers compliant. Committing itself to technology research and development, the company owes three large technology centers globally and has developed over 20 trading plugins.

For more information please contact TorrentFX at info@torrentfx.com

About Financial Commission

Financial Commission is an independent external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for consumers/traders who are unable to resolve disputes directly with their financial services providers that are members of the Financial Commission. Financial Commission initially set out to provide a new approach for traders and brokers alike to resolve any issues that arise in the course of trading electronic markets such Foreign Exchange, and then expanded into CFDs and related derivatives, in addition to certifying technology platforms used for trading.

For more information please contact us at info@financialcommission.org
